Reviews.Title: “Absolutely brilliant service and location - PERFECT!!!”
Reviews.Author: AmyBorro
Reviews.Content: ok consider little bit snob comes hotels sense clean look pretty money allow stay rated hotel planning wedding sticking strict budget trip paris tend establish price range figure hotel reviews thats alba opera wasnt blown pictures tell def wasnt five star hotel stretch imagination arrival left incredibly impressed staff treated customers yes hotel wasnt particularly modern bit revamp spruce staff immediate control perfect incredibly courteous friendly offered advice whenever locals eat etc recommendation provided staff trumps breakfast little overpriced compared boulangerie breakfast fast favourite meal day food fresh plentiful extra items request extra charge breakfast whenever happy bring location hotel fantastic little boutiquey feel theres tiny tiny lift floors isnt wheelchair instance hotel located street quiet night overall clean fresh linens smell little bit stale im assuming smoking else impressing free wifi added bonus def recommend pleasant stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff, great value...”
Reviews.Author: JodieHatley1
Reviews.Content: booked hotel extremely price 5 nights hotel excellent location close metro stations walking distance sacre couer moulin rouge pigalle isnt dodgy anticipated safe walking 1am metro cheap efficient especially safe tv staff lovely friendly helpful recommend eat nearby cleaned day breakfast filling couldnt fault hotel definitely stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “AUTHENTIC PARISIEN CHARM”
Reviews.Author: tgord
Reviews.Content: fantastic location 4 metro stations walking distance hotel staff beyond lovely short break helped restaurant reservations directed streets shop lunch breakfast typically french croissants baguettes assorted jams delicious hot chocolate decor dated arent mod cons offer free wi fi loved charm definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Made my stay in Paris Perfect!!”
Reviews.Author: SpaGirl85
Reviews.Content: booked hotel basically available weekend paris due bank holiday weekend am glad found perfect recommend stay location perfect close walking moulin rouge sacre cour pigalle station beautiful cafesrestaurants arrived lady reception lovely expecting offered assistance service laundry basically partner kitchen bathroom dbl bedroom balcony overlooking street cute clean fault carpet cares paid 125 euro night including breakfast consisted baguette choc croissant croissant tea juice nice

Reviews.Title: “Lovely atmospheric Parisienne hotel”
Reviews.Author: TauntonHeadGardener
Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights read reviews prepared worn carpets tired decor love atmosphere city hotel quiet except bin collections 6 friday mornings clock available kitchenette wasnt expected microwave wall pay 3 euros kitchen pack 2 plates mugs tumblers wine glasses basic cutlery pans didnt youll own coffeetea etc none provided nice extra sit wakes earlier drink tea course eating tres cher lovely nearby restaurants choice beds comfortable duvets loved lift bath lovely taps shower extremely powerful little leaky yes hear stairs boom boom boom loud music didnt breakfast cant comment dining mccafe nearby towards cadet metro station offer pastry drink 180 euros record recommend auberge du corner hotel road onto rue de martyrs top facing 5 mins walk lovely food friendly atmosphere martyrs italian food drink paris pricey prepared outside louvre beer mint tea 14 euros transport easy nearby metro stations easier navigate buses frequent latin quarter sit outside coffee shop front sorbonne lovely surrounded sorts people tourists jardin des plantes lovely sit free eiffel tower wait sometimes hours start holiday
